div.h4: DOAgri ERP with Drone Imaging and AI Advisory
div.p: The Smart Agri ERP system integrates drone technology and OpenAI-powered advisory intelligence into a unified agricultural management platform. It enables modern farms to automate crop monitoring, optimize resource usage, and make data-driven decisions for higher productivity and sustainability. The system combines ERP for operational efficiency, drones for real-time data capture, and OpenAI for intelligent recommendations.

ul.li: Crop and field planning: Define crop types, sowing schedules, and plot segmentation.
Resource management: Track inputs like seeds, fertilizers, pesticides, and labor.
Task automation: Create and assign tasks to workers based on AI advisory or manual inputs.
Finance and compliance: Generate reports for subsidies, cost analysis, yield estimation, and government compliance.

div.p: Drones equipped with multispectral and thermal cameras fly over farmlands to collect real-time imagery. They monitor plant health, soil moisture levels, pest infestations, and crop growth stages. Flights are scheduled through the ERP based on crop cycles, weather forecasts, and user-defined intervals.

AI-driven forecasting models predict yield, resource demand, and pest trends based on climatic patterns and historical data. These insights help farmers plan harvest schedules, procure resources in advance, and reduce crop loss.

Captured images are analyzed using OpenAI’s vision models to identify anomalies, such as nutrient deficiencies, water stress, or disease outbreaks. The system learns over time from historical data, satellite insights, and local agronomic models to generate tailored advisory messages.

A farmer-friendly mobile app and a web dashboard provide real-time updates, drone video feeds, task assignments, and AI recommendations in local languages. Push notifications alert users to critical actions like disease outbreaks or irrigation needs.
